What is it?

tmda-cgi is an beta-release program for managing your TMDA account over the web. tmda-cgi can:

  • Configure a user's account to use TMDA. [Notes]
  • Remove TMDA from a user's account.
  • Page through lists of pending e-mail (mail received by your MTA, but still awaiting confirmation)
  • View the text content (and see what sorts of attachments are included) in any of your pending e-mails
  • Strip Javascript and other "nasty" bits when viewing e-mails
  • Allow sending URL-based links in your confirmation e-mails so users can surf instead of replying.
  • Release (move into your mail folder as if a confirmation had been received) any of your pending e-mails
  • Delete any pending e-mail
  • Whitelist or blacklist the author of any pending e-mails
  • Report spammers to services such as SpamCop
  • Generate dynamic ("keyword", "dated", and "sender") addresses
  • Test dynamic addresses
  • Edit both incoming and outgoing filter files (disable-able)
  • Edit any of your text-file based lists
  • Edit your local TMDA configuration file (disable-able)
  • View the global TMDA configuration file
  • Edit the templates used in challenges & bounces (disable-able)
  • Configure a variety of parameters from within tmda-cgi
  • Select a theme (although only one theme is currently included in the releases)
  • View configuration information and pertinent links
